title: Custom Software Engineer
description:
**Project Role :** 
 Custom Software Engineer
   

  

**Project Role Description :** 
 Develop custom software solutions to design, code, and enhance components across systems or applications. Use modern frameworks and agile practices to deliver scalable, high\\-performing solutions tailored to specific business needs.
   

  

**Must have skills :** 
 React.js
   

  

**Good to have skills :** 
 NA
   

  

**Educational Qualification :** 
 Minimum 15 years of full time education
   

  

 , Project Role : Application Developer Project Role Description : Design, build and configure applications to meet business process and application requirements. Must have Skills : React.js Good to Have Skills : Job Requirements : Key Responsibilities : Expected to be an SME.\\- Collaborate and manage the team to perform.\\- Responsible for team decisions.\\- Engage with multiple teams and contribute on key decisions.\\- Provide solutions to problems for their immediate team and across multiple teams.\\- Facilitate regular team meetings to discuss progress and address any roadblocks. Technical Experience : Must To Have Skills: Proficiency in React.js.\\- Strong understanding of front\\-end development principles and best practices.\\- Experience with state management libraries such as Redux or MobX.\\- Familiarity with RESTful APIs and asynchronous programming.\\- Knowledge of testing frameworks like Jest or Mocha. Professional Attributes : 1: Strong team facilitation skills2: Strong interpersonal skills including conflict resolution skills 3: Excellent oral and written communication skills with all levels of the organization Educational Qualification: Minimum 15 years of full time education Additional Information :, Minimum 15 years of full time education

title: Web Developer Intern
description:
**Web Developer Intern (Paid Internship)** 




  





 Company: SkillzenLoop
 



 Location: Remote / Work From Home
 



 Duration: 1–3 Months
 



 Stipend: ₹15,000 per month
 



 Internship Mode: Full\\-Time
 



 Career Outlook: Internship Certificate \\+ Full\\-Time Job Opportunity Based on Performance
 



  





 About SkillzenLoop
 



  





 SkillzenLoop is a technology\\-driven organization specializing in digital solutions, product development, and automation services. Our focus is on building modern, fast, and scalable web applications. We empower interns with practical experience, mentoring, and real project involvement to accelerate their careers.
 



  





 Role Overview
 



  





 SkillzenLoop is seeking a passionate Web Developer Intern who loves creating interactive and visually appealing websites. You will work closely with our development and design teams to build efficient user experiences and contribute to real\\-world client projects.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 



 • Develop responsive and user\\-friendly web pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
 



 • Assist in implementing web features using frameworks like React.js, Angular, or Vue.js
 



 • Collaborate with backend developers to integrate APIs
 



 • Optimize website performance for speed, SEO, and accessibility
 



 • Debug issues related to UI, responsiveness, or functionality
 



 • Ensure cross\\-browser compatibility and mobile\\-first design
 



 • Maintain clean code structure and documentation
 



  





 Requirements
 



 • Pursuing or recently completed a degree in Computer Science, IT, Web Development, or related fields
 



 • Good understanding of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
 



 • Basic knowledge of front\\-end frameworks/tools
 



 • Familiarity with Git/GitHub version control
 



 • Strong eye for design and attention to detail
 



 • Problem\\-solving approach and willingness to learn continuously
 



  





 What You Will Gain
 



 • ₹15,000 monthly stipend
 



 • Real project experience to build your portfolio
 



 • Mentorship from experienced web developers
 



 • Internship completion certificate

title: Software Engineer
description:
****Job Requirements****
* Job Title: Software Engineer (C\\#/.NET) – Job Description


 We are seeking a mid\\-level Software Engineer with strong C\\#/.NET skills to build reliable APIs and services, support microservices\\-based applications, and drive high\\-quality delivery using modern DevOps tooling. You will contribute across design, development, testing, security, and CI/CD, ensuring robust, secure, and maintainable software.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Design and Development
* Build and maintain backend services and APIs using C\\#/.NET
* Implement microservices aligned to best practices in scalability, resilience, and observability
* Develop automation scripts in shell for Linux\\-based environments; create utility tools with Python as needed
* Contribute to frontend components using React where required
* Quality, Security, and Testing
* Write and maintain unit tests using .NET unit testing frameworks
* Enforce code quality and secure coding practices with SonarQube (SAST) and Frogbot (SCA)
* Perform code reviews, refactoring, and documentation to maintain high standards
* DevOps and Delivery
* Design and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and/or GitHub Actions
* Manage source code in Git; follow trunk/branching strategies and pull request workflows
* Build, package, and run services using Docker; manage artifacts via JFrog Artifactory


**Basic Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field, or equivalent experience
* Proficiency in C\\#/.NET for backend/API development
* Hands\\-on experience with microservices architecture and Docker
* Working knowledge of Linux and shell scripting
* Familiarity with Python for scripting/utilities
* Experience with unit testing frameworks
* Practical experience with CI/CD (Jenkins and/or GitHub Actions) and Git
* Experience with SonarQube (SAST) and Frogbot for SCA
* Experience using JFrog Artifactory for artifact management
* Familiarity with React for frontend contributions

title: Diploma / Graduate Engineer Intern
description:
**Diploma / Graduate Engineer Intern (Paid Internship)** 




  





 Company: SkillzenLoop
 



 Mode: Remote / Work From Home
 



 Duration: 1–3 Months
 



 Stipend: ₹15,000 per month
 



 Type: Full\\-Time Internship
 



 Career Growth: Internship Certificate \\+ Full\\-Time Opportunity Based on Performance
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 About SkillzenLoop
 



  





 SkillzenLoop is a fast\\-growing digital and technology solutions company focused on IT services, product development, and automation. We are committed to transforming fresh engineering talent into skilled professionals capable of solving real\\-world industrial challenges.
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 Role Overview
 



  





 We are hiring Diploma / Graduate Engineer Interns across multiple engineering disciplines. Based on your skills and interests, you will be assigned to roles such as software development, data analysis, testing, product support, or automation.
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 Key Responsibilities (Role\\-Based)
 



  





 You may be involved in:
 



 • Assisting engineering teams in development, testing, or support tasks
 



 • Performing research, documentation, and data gathering activities
 



 • Troubleshooting technical issues and contributing to process improvements
 



 • Supporting product or project teams in planning and execution
 



 • Working with tools, software, or databases related to your domain
 



 • Ensuring quality standards and timelines are met
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 Eligibility
 



 • Diploma / B.Tech / B.E in Computer Science, IT, Electronics, Electrical, Mechanical, Civil, AI/ML, Data Science, or relevant engineering discipline (Pursuing or Completed)
 



 • Fundamental understanding of engineering concepts in chosen domain
 



 • Good communication and teamwork abilities
 



 • Analytical mindset and ability to learn quickly
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 Preferred Skills (Nice to Have)
 



 • Basic exposure to programming, CAD tools, automation, cloud, or analytics depending on domain
 



 • Problem\\-solving approach with a willingness to explore innovation
 



  





 ⸻
 



  





 What You Will Gain
 



 • Stipend: ₹15,000 per month
 



 • Hands\\-on experience working with real projects and live environments
 



 • Mentorship from engineering experts and senior professionals
 



 • Internship Completion Certificate

title: Software Developer
description:
**Company Description**

 UNIPREP is a Career Tech Platform dedicated to connecting employers with talented professionals. We empower individuals to succeed in the modern workforce by providing access to more than 70 premium features. At UNIPREP, innovation and technology drive our mission to bridge the gap between talent and opportunity. We strive to foster growth and professional development for all users of our platform.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time remote role for a Software Developer. The individual in this role will design, develop, and maintain software solutions, with a focus on back\\-end web development. Responsibilities include coding, testing, debugging, implementing object\\-oriented programming techniques, and improving system functionality. The developer will work collaboratively with multi\\-functional teams to build scalable and reliable applications.
   




**Qualifications**
* Strong foundation in Computer Science principles, including algorithms, data structures, and software development methodologies.
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development, with experience in designing and building scalable solutions.
* Expertise in Programming languages and Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts.
* Problem\\-solving skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team\\-oriented environment.
* Experience with debugging, testing, and maintaining software applications.
* Familiarity with version control systems, such as Git, is a plus.
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field is preferred.

title: Software Developer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Ravionex Industries Pvt Ltd is an emerging Health\\-Tech and Consumer Solutions company dedicated to creating meaningful impacts through innovative ideas. We focus on developing science\\-backed personal care products and digital healthcare solutions while upholding principles of transparency, research, and ethical innovation. With an aim to improve everyday life, we design user\\-centric and accessible technologies that enhance health and wellness. Our work spans health\\-tech solutions, consumer wellness innovations, and research\\-based formulations. Headquartered in India, we are passionate about driving positive change through entrepreneurship.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a full\\-time on\\-site Software Developer role located in Mansa. The Software Developer will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining software solutions. Daily tasks will include back\\-end web development, programming, and implementation of object\\-oriented programming principles to build scalable and high\\-performing applications. The role involves collaborating closely with cross\\-functional teams to address technical challenges and refine system architecture.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Strong foundation in Computer Science, including algorithms and data structures.
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and Software Development practices.
* Experience with Programming languages and frameworks relevant to modern software development.
* Knowledge of Object\\-Oriented Programming (OOP) principles and their practical applications.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work independently as well as collaboratively.
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* Experience with healthcare or consumer solutions software is a plus.
* Willingness to work on\\-site at the Mansa location.

title: Application Engineer
description:
**Company Description**

 PInterview is an innovative online platform dedicated to revolutionizing the way individuals prepare for interviews. By offering online mock interviews with industry professionals, PInterview helps students and professionals enhance their interview skills through live video or telephonic sessions. The platform aims to reshape the preparation process, empowering tomorrow's leaders with top\\-notch career consulting services from global industry experts.
   




**Role Description**

 This is a full\\-time on\\-site role for an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Consultant based in Bengaluru. The ERP Consultant will be responsible for analyzing business processes, implementing ERP solutions, and providing finance\\-related consulting. This role involves conducting needs assessments, configuring ERP software, training users, and ensuring seamless ERP integrations to optimize organizational efficiency.
   




**Qualifications**
* Proficiency in Business Process analysis and implementation
* Strong Analytical Skills and problem\\-solving abilities
* Experience in ERP Implementations and Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) solutions
* Knowledge of finance and financial processes within ERP systems
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
* Prior experience in a consulting role is a plus
* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business, Finance, Information Systems, or a related field

title: Operations & Implementation Engineer
description:
**Job Title:**
 Operations \\& Implementation Engineer
 



  





**Location:**
 Chennai \\| Field \\+ Office Role \\| Healthcare SaaS
 



**Experience:**
 Fresh Graduates, 0\\-3 years of experience
 



  





**About Us**




 Schedul.co is a tech startup based in Chennai revolutionizing the healthcare experience. We eliminate long wait times and chaotic health records with AI\\-powered scheduling, real\\-time queue management, and integrated digital medical records.
 



  





 We work closely with clinics, hospitals, and diagnostic centers to digitize their daily operations and improve both patient experience and operational efficiency.
 



  





 We’re looking for self\\-driven individuals who enjoy execution, coordination, and customer interaction; people who can take ownership of implementations and ensure customers successfully adopt our platform.
 



  





 At Schedul.co, you will work directly with founders, product, and support teams, and your contribution will have a visible, measurable impact on business growth.
 



  





**Why Join Us?**




 \\- Own the
 **complete customer implementation lifecycle.** 




 \\- Work directly with doctors, clinic staff, and administrators.
 



 \\- Play a key role in customer adoption and long\\-term success.
 



 \\- Gain hands\\-on exposure to healthcare operations and SaaS workflows.
 



 \\- Earn
 **recurring incentives** 
 based on successful implementations.
 



  





**Role Summary \\& Responsibilities:**




 \\- Take ownership of customer onboarding after sales handover
 



 \\- Coordinate with clinics/hospitals to collect onboarding inputs and requirements
 



 \\- Configure the Schedul.co platform based on customer workflows
 



 \\- Conduct on\\-site or remote training for:
 


* Doctors / Clinician Assistants / Technicians
* Reception and admin staff



 \\- Manage pilot usage, UAT, and ensure smooth go\\-live
 



 \\- Act as the primary point of contact during implementation
 



 \\- Ensure customers actively use the platform post go\\-live
 



 \\- Coordinate with internal support and product teams for issue resolution
 



 \\- Track implementation status, usage metrics, and follow\\-ups
 



 \\- Ensure subscription activation and readiness for monthly billing
 



 \\- Visit customer locations when required for onboarding, training, or audits
 



 \\- Maintain documentation, checklists, and status updates for assigned accounts
 



  





**Desired Skillset \\& Qualifications:**




 \\- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
 



 \\- High ownership mindset with strong follow\\-up discipline.
 



 \\- Comfortable working in a
 **field \\+ coordination role** 
 .
 



 \\- Ability to explain software workflows to non\\-technical users.
 



 \\- Organized, detail\\-oriented, and process\\-driven.
 



 \\- Comfortable using tools like:
 


* WhatsApp, Google Sheets, MS Excel
* CRM or task tracking tools



 \\- Willingness to travel locally for customer visits and training.
 



 \\- Basic understanding of SaaS products is a plus (training will be provided).
 



 \\- Bachelor’s degree in any discipline (Engineering / Management preferred).
 



  





**Performance Expectations:**




 \\- Successful onboarding and go\\-live of assigned customers
 



 \\- Timely completion of implementations
 



 \\- High customer adoption and active usage post go\\-live
 



 \\- Clear documentation and follow\\-up discipline
 



 \\- Minimal escalations and effective coordination with support teams
 



  





**Salary \\& Benefits:**




**Fixed Salary:** 
 ₹25,000 /month;
 



**Incentives:** 




 \\- Recurring incentive for every successfully implemented and active customer
 



 \\- Incentives tied to onboarding completion and sustained usage
 



**Travel Allowance:** 
 Fixed monthly TA, in addition to salary.
 



**Growth Opportunity:** 




 \\- Fast learning curve in SaaS operations and healthcare workflows
 



 \\- Opportunity to grow into Senior Operations / Customer Success roles
 



**Work Schedule:** 




 \\- 5\\-day workweek; Saturdays half\\-day working.
 



 \\- Occasional weekend work may be required for training or critical go\\-lives.
 



  





**Selection Process:**




 Shortlisted candidates will be contacted for:
 



 \\- Initial discussion
 



 \\- Role\\-fit and scenario\\-based interview
 



  





*“Operations is where promises turn into reality. You will be responsible for ensuring that every customer successfully adopts what sales has sold.”*

title: Data Engineer - II
description:
**Role Overview:** 




  





 We are looking for a Data Engineer to build and own large\\-scale data infrastructure powering analytics, product insights, and business decision\\-making. You will define core Sources of Truth (SOT), design unified data models, and build reliable batch and streaming pipelines processing high\\-volume event and transactional data.
 



 This role sits at the intersection of
 **Software, SRE and data engineering** 
 , requiring strong foundations in distributed systems, SQL, and big data processing. This role requires the engineer to own E2E Stack i.e. from set up to development of high volume data pipelines.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 




  




* Building Design, build, and automate large\\-scale, high\\-performance data pipelines (batch and streaming)
* Define and own Sources of Truth (SOT) and dataset design used across multiple teams
* Streamline ingestion and processing of raw event sources into authoritative event logs
* Lead data engineering projects ensuring pipelines are reliable, efficient, testable, and maintainable
* Design and optimize data models for analytics, reporting, and downstream product use cases
* Build systems to monitor data quality, data loss, SLAs, and reliability of Tier\\-1 and Tier\\-2 datasets
* Devise strategies to detect, reconcile, and compensate for data loss across multiple sources
* Evangelize high\\-quality software engineering practices for data infrastructure at scale.
* Collaborate with Data Science, Analytics, Product, and Engineering teams to align on data architecture
* Contribute to shared data tooling, frameworks, and standards to improve developer productivity



  





**Requirements:** 




  




* 3\\-5\\+ years of relevant Data Engineering or Software Engineering experience.
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent practical experience.
* Strong, hands\\-on expertise in SQL (mandatory) — performance tuning, query optimization, and analytical modeling
* Strong experience working with large\\-scale datasets (terabyte to petabyte\\-scale)
* Solid background in distributed systems design and operation
* Excellent SQL skills (mandatory); experience with complex analytical queries. Solid understanding of data modeling (star/snowflake schemas, fact \\& dimension tables)
* Hands\\-on experience with Spark and data processing frameworks
* Proficiency in one or more programming languages: Java, Scala, or Python



  





**About FealtyX:** 




  






 FealtyX is revolutionizing the way Brands and Banks focus on growth. We are building a new\\-age growth platform that empowers Banks to collaborate with Brands to launch hyper\\-targeted campaigns, helping them reach the right target audience and drive higher ROI.
 




  






 We are growing and actively hiring across the roles. If you are looking to be part of the core team building the new\\-age growth platform, do reach out to us. Great perks if you join us \\-
 



* Be a part of the team that solves the most burning problem \\- Achieving Growth.
* Opportunity to join an early\\-stage team, giving you a lot of ownership and accelerated career growth
* Intense brainstorming and whiteboarding on interesting problems and innovation guaranteed.
* Work directly with founders and align with the vision of the company.
* Competitive ESOPs aligned with the company's long\\-term vision.



  






 In case of any queries or want to talk about the team, feel free to reach out to 
 
 hr@fealtyx.com

title: Technical Lead- Fullstack
job_function: Information Technology, Project Management, and Product Management
description:
**Job Description – Full Stack Lead** 




 The Full Stack Lead is responsible for driving the end\\-to\\-end design, development, and delivery of scalable, high\\-quality backend and frontend solutions using .NET Core, Angular, and AWS. In this leadership role, the Lead will guide and mentor a team of software engineers, provide technical direction, and ensure best\\-in\\-class engineering practices are followed across projects.
 



 The role requires strong expertise in building modular, reusable components, profiling and optimizing application performance, and staying updated with emerging technologies to continuously enhance the product ecosystem.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 




  





**Technical Leadership** 



* Provide technical leadership and direction across backend, frontend, and cloud components.
* Lead a team of engineers in delivering business\\-critical applications while ensuring code quality, scalability, and performance.
* Mentor and coach junior and mid\\-level engineers, supporting their technical growth and ensuring adherence to best practices.
* Take complete ownership of the system design, architecture, and implementation of complex applications.



  





**Full Stack Development** 



* Develop reusable, testable, and high\\-quality backend services and microservices using
 **.NET Core** 
 .
* Build responsive and dynamic frontend interfaces using
 **Angular** 
 , ensuring optimal performance across devices and browsers.
* Design and implement reusable components, libraries, and UI frameworks using technologies like
 **Stencil** 
 and
 **Storybook** 
 .



  





**Cloud \\& DevOps** 



* Build and deploy cloud\\-native applications on
 **AWS** 
 , implementing monitoring, alerting, and observability.
* Develop CI/CD pipelines and automated testing frameworks using
 **Terraform** 
 or
 **AWS CDK** 
 .
* Ensure secure, scalable, and reliable cloud application architecture.



  





**Architecture \\& Performance** 



* Contribute to defining backend, frontend, and mobile application architecture.
* Identify, diagnose, and resolve performance, scalability, and reliability issues across the stack.
* Optimize application components for maximum efficiency on web and mobile platforms.



  





**Collaboration \\& Delivery** 



* Work closely with Product Managers, Designers, and cross\\-functional engineering teams to deliver user\\-centric products.
* Participate in design reviews, code reviews, and technical audits to maintain engineering excellence.
* Translate design concepts, process flows, and wireframes into high\\-quality, maintainable code.



  





**Mobile \\& Cross\\-Platform** 



* Support mobile application design and architecture, ensuring optimal performance across mobile web environments.



  





**General** 



* Build and manage reusable systems to support future scalability and rapid development.
* Execute responsibilities effectively with or without reasonable accommodation.

title: MuleSoft Developer
description:
**Role:** 
 Salesforce MuleSoft Developer
 



**Experience:** 
 6–8 Years
 



**Location:** 
 Delhi
 



**About the Role** 




 We are hiring a
 **Salesforce MuleSoft Developer** 
 with strong expertise in designing, developing, and optimizing integration solutions using MuleSoft. The ideal candidate has hands\\-on experience with MuleSoft standalone on\\-premises development, advanced DataWeave (DWL), connectors, and enterprise integration patterns.
 



 You will work closely with Salesforce and cross\\-functional technical teams to architect seamless integrations, build reusable components, ensure performance, and deliver secure, reliable APIs.
 



**Key Responsibilities** 




**Integration Development** 



* Design, develop, and maintain robust
 **MuleSoft integration solutions** 
 for Salesforce and other enterprise systems.
* Configure and manage connectivity using multiple
 **MuleSoft connectors** 
 (HTTP, AWS, SFDC, SFTP, DB, SMTP, Java Module).
* Implement
 **end\\-to\\-end integration flows** 
 , batch processes, orchestration, and reusable components.



**Error Handling \\& Quality Control** 



* Develop
 **fault\\-tolerant workflows** 
 , global error handlers, on\\-error\\-continue/on\\-error\\-propagate patterns.
* Participate in
 **unit testing, QA cycles** 
 , and performance testing.



**Performance, Monitoring \\& Optimization** 



* Monitor integration pipelines, troubleshoot production issues, and optimize runtime performance.
* Apply best practices in caching, threading, pooling profiles, and scalability.



**Documentation \\& Collaboration** 



* Create detailed
 **technical documentation** 
 , mapping specs, API contracts, and deployment instructions.
* Collaborate with Salesforce teams, architects, DevOps, and business SMEs to ensure successful project delivery.



**Architecture \\& Best Practices** 



* Implement
 **API\\-led connectivity** 
 : System APIs, Process APIs, Experience APIs.
* Apply integration design patterns like
 **scatter\\-gather, choice routers, for\\-each, parallel for\\-each** 
 , etc.
* Maintain security best practices: OAuth, TLS, secrets management, policies.
* Stay updated with MuleSoft releases, new connectors, and industry trends.



**Required Qualifications** 



* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.
* **6–8 years** 
 overall experience with at least
 **3\\+ years in MuleSoft** 
 .
* Strong experience in
 **API/Web Service development (REST/SOAP)** 
 .
* Hands\\-on experience with
 **MuleSoft Standalone On\\-Premise** 
 runtime.
* Deep knowledge of core MuleSoft components and integration patterns.
* **Advanced DWL (DataWeave) skills** 
 — reduce, pluck, flatten, mapObject, filters, etc.
* Experience with
 **pooling profiles** 
 , threading strategies, and performance optimization.
* Knowledge of
 **IDP \\& Agentforce** 
 setups is a plus.
* MuleSoft certification is an advantage.

title: Windows Developer IRC283716
description:
**Description**
 looking for a .NET developer to join our team. This position is for a well\\-rounded individual with solid experience in the .NET environment, to contribute to substantial new mobile projects on Windows tablets. This person is comfortable writing WPF desktop, ASP.NET, or UWP applications, and has a firm grasp of MVVM principles. This person is accomplished in the full software development stack, from UI to data storage.
   

  

 Professionally, this person is driven to execute, deliver, and complete projects independently, seeking advice and direction from team members when needed, and plowing ahead to completion when the path forward is clear. This person will be able to point to specific examples that highlight the individual’s ability to meet the objectives outlined above, and references will confirm this person’s unique abilities.
   

  

**Requirements**
 Technologies and Skills:
   

  

 Deep knowledge of C\\#, .NET, and Visual Studio.
   

  

 MVVM and XAML.
   

  

 Eye for good UI/UX.
   

  

 Experience building a cleanly decoupled solution.
   

  

 Experience with modern asynchronous programming paradigms.
   

  

 Ability to collaborate effectively with technical partners.
   

  

 Job responsibilities
   

  

 Design, develop, and maintain high\\-performance Windows software applications using C\\#, C, and C\\+\\+. Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define requirements, architect solutions, and deliver features with strong focus on quality, reliability, and security. Troubleshoot complex issues, optimize performance, and support legacy systems while driving modernization initiatives. Mentor junior engineers and promote best practices in coding, testing, and documentation.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

**Culture of caring.** 
 At GlobalLogic, we prioritize a culture of caring. Across every region and department, at every level, we consistently put people first. From day one, you’ll experience an inclusive culture of acceptance and belonging, where you’ll have the chance to build meaningful connections with collaborative teammates, supportive managers, and compassionate leaders.
   

  

**Learning and development.** 
 We are committed to your continuous learning and development. You’ll learn and grow daily in an environment with many opportunities to try new things, sharpen your skills, and advance your career at GlobalLogic. With our Career Navigator tool as just one example, GlobalLogic offers a rich array of programs, training curricula, and hands\\-on opportunities to grow personally and professionally.
   

  

**Interesting \\& meaningful work.** 
 GlobalLogic is known for engineering impact for and with clients around the world. As part of our team, you’ll have the chance to work on projects that matter. Each is a unique opportunity to engage your curiosity and creative problem\\-solving skills as you help clients reimagine what’s possible and bring new solutions to market. In the process, you’ll have the privilege of working on some of the most cutting\\-edge and impactful solutions shaping the world today.
   

  

**Balance and flexibility.** 
 We believe in the importance of balance and flexibility. With many functional career areas, roles, and work arrangements, you can explore ways of achieving the perfect balance between your work and life. Your life extends beyond the office, and we always do our best to help you integrate and balance the best of work and life, having fun along the way!
   

  

**High\\-trust organization.** 
 We are a high\\-trust organization where integrity is key. By joining GlobalLogic, you’re placing your trust in a safe, reliable, and ethical global company. Integrity and trust are a cornerstone of our value proposition to our employees and clients. You will find truthfulness, candor, and integrity in everything we do.
   

  

**About GlobalLogic**
 GlobalLogic, a Hitachi Group Company, is a trusted digital engineering partner to the world’s largest and most forward\\-thinking companies. Since 2000, we’ve been at the forefront of the digital revolution – helping create some of the most innovative and widely used digital products and experiences. Today we continue to collaborate with clients in transforming businesses and redefining industries through intelligent products, platforms, and services.

title: Pipeline designer/Engineer
description:
**Company Description**
  

 Petrochem Designs, established on 2020, is a rapidly growing engineering and design firm providing cutting\\-edge, cost\\-efficient solutions for various process industries, including Oil \\& Gas, Power, and Food Processing. Known for its expertise, the company delivers comprehensive engineering services in Process, Piping, Mechanical, Electrical \\& Instrumentation, and Civil \\& Structural disciplines. Petrochem Designs integrates international standards such as ASME, API, ASTM, IS, and IEC to ensure precision and reliability. Specializing in automation and custom software development for tools like AVEVA E3D and Autodesk Plant 3D, the company focuses on enhancing workflows and project efficiency. With advanced 3D modeling and intelligent project management, Petrochem Designs is committed to delivering sustainable, innovative solutions to its industry partners.
   

  

**Role Description**
  

 This is a contract role for a Pipeline Designer/Engineer based in Chennai with a hybrid work model, allowing flexibility for some work\\-from\\-home. The responsibilities for this role include preparing and reviewing pipeline designs, conducting project\\-specific design calculations, and utilizing various computer\\-aided design (CAD) tools for detailed layouts and equipment modeling. Additionally, the role involves collaborating with cross\\-disciplinary teams to ensure compliance with project specifications and international standards. The candidate will also optimize designs for efficiency, safety, and feasibility within the scope of diverse process industries.
   

  

**Qualifications**
  

* Proficiency in Design Engineering and Product Design, with experience in pipeline and piping systems.
* Strong understanding of Mechanical Engineering principles and their application to industrial processes.
* Hands\\-on experience with Computer\\-Aided Design (CAD) tools and 3D modeling software.
* Foundational knowledge of Electrical Engineering applicable to pipeline systems is a plus.
* Effective problem\\-solving skills and ability to optimize engineering designs to match project requirements.
* Bachelor’s degree in a relevant engineering field (Mechanical, Civil, or Electrical) or equivalent work experience.
* Familiarity with international standards such as ASME, API, or ASTM is highly desirable.
* Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively in cross\\-functional and remote teams.
